mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SG_BOARD_POST(sgID, sgTitle, userID, sgDate, sgContent) VALUES(#{sgID}, #{sgTitle}, #{userID}, #{sgDate}, #{sgContent})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS currentDateTime FROM DUAL
SELECT * FROM SG_BOARD_POST WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY sgID DESC
SELECT * FROM SG_BOARD_POST WHERE sgTitle LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR userID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
SELECT * FROM SG_BOARD_POST WHERE sgID < #{sgID} ORDER BY sgID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM SG_BOARD_POST WHERE sgID > #{sgID} ORDER BY sgID ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
